newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Wonderful Wire debuts at 11.00 rgt.
newsitem.headline: Wonderful Wire debuts at 11.00 rgt.

text.p: Malaysia's Wonderful Wire & Cable Bhd debuted on the Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange on Thursday at 11.00 ringgit, against a 3.60 ringgit offer price.
The maker of electrical wires and cables had issued 3.69 million new shares. At 0935 GMT, the stock was trading at 10.50 ringgit.

The company has forecast a pre-tax profit of 7.4 million ringgit or 37.23 cents per share for the year ended December 31, 1997 against an expected pre-tax profit of 6.7 million or 40.50 cents a share in the 1996 year.

Part of the proceeds from the public issue will be used to set up a new plant to produce copper rods. Wonderful Wire has said it also plans to widen its range of products and is developing the production of high-resolution speaker cables.
